trans-unit.source: When overridden in a derived class, represents the content of a SOAP header.
trans-unit.target: 在衍生類別中覆寫時，表示 SOAP 標頭的內容。

trans-unit.source: SOAP headers offer a method for passing data to and from an XML Web service method if the data is not directly related to the XML Web service method's primary functionality.
trans-unit.target: SOAP 標頭提供傳遞資料以及從 XML Web service 方法，如果 XML Web 服務方法的主要功能不直接相關資料的方法。

trans-unit.source: For instance, an XML Web service might contain several XML Web service methods that each require a custom authentication scheme.
trans-unit.target: 例如，XML Web 服務可能包含數個 XML Web service 方法，每個需要自訂驗證配置。

trans-unit.source: Instead of adding parameters to each XML Web service method for the custom authentication scheme, a <xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.SoapHeaderAttribute>, referring to a class deriving from <xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.SoapHeader>, can be applied to each XML Web service method.
trans-unit.target: 而不是將參數加入至每個 XML Web 服務方法的自訂驗證配置， <xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.SoapHeaderAttribute>、 參考至類別，衍生自<xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.SoapHeader>，可以套用至每個 XML Web service 方法。

trans-unit.source: The implementation for the class deriving from <xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.SoapHeader> handles the custom authentication scheme.
trans-unit.target: 從衍生類別實作<xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.SoapHeader>處理自訂驗證配置。

trans-unit.source: In this manner, the XML Web service method implements only the functionality specific to it and adds additional functionality using a SOAP header.
trans-unit.target: 這種方式，XML Web service 方法實作僅它特有的功能，並加入其他功能使用 SOAP 標頭。

trans-unit.source: The following list outlines the basic steps to receiving and processing a SOAP header:
trans-unit.target: 下列清單會列出接收和處理 SOAP 標頭的基本步驟：

trans-unit.source: Create a class that derives from <xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.SoapHeader> representing the data passed into the SOAP header.
trans-unit.target: 建立衍生自類別<xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.SoapHeader>表示資料傳入的 SOAP 標頭。

trans-unit.source: Add a member to the class implementing an XML Web service or an XML Web service client proxy class, of the type created in the first step.
trans-unit.target: 將成員加入至類別實作 XML Web 服務或 XML Web 服務用戶端 proxy 類別，第一個步驟中建立的類型。

trans-unit.source: Apply a <xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.SoapHeaderAttribute> to the XML Web service method or the corresponding method in the proxy class, specifying the member created in the second step in the <xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.SoapHeaderAttribute.MemberName%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 套用<xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.SoapHeaderAttribute>XML Web service 方法或在 proxy 類別中對應的方法，指定成員中建立第二個步驟<xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.SoapHeaderAttribute.MemberName%2A>屬性。

trans-unit.source: Within the XML Web service method or XML Web service client code, access the <xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.SoapHeaderAttribute.MemberName%2A> property to process the data sent in the SOAP header.
trans-unit.target: 在 XML Web 服務方法或 XML Web 服務用戶端程式碼，存取<xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.SoapHeaderAttribute.MemberName%2A>屬性來處理 SOAP 標頭中傳送的資料。

trans-unit.source: The following `MyWebService` XML Web service defines the `MyHeader` SOAP header and requires it to be sent with any calls to the `MyWebMethod` XML Web service method.
trans-unit.target: 下列`MyWebService`XML Web 服務定義`MyHeader`SOAP 標頭，並需要將它與任何呼叫一起傳送`MyWebMethod`XML Web service 方法。

trans-unit.source: Additionally, `MyWebMethod` receives any SOAP headers other than the `MyHeader` SOAP header.
trans-unit.target: 此外，`MyWebMethod`接收任何 SOAP 標頭以外`MyHeader`SOAP 標頭。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Web.Services.Protocols.SoapHeader" /> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化 <see cref="T:System.Web.Services.Protocols.SoapHeader" /> 類別的新執行個體。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the recipient of the SOAP header.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定 SOAP 標頭的收件者。

trans-unit.source: The recipient of the SOAP header.
trans-unit.target: SOAP 標頭的收件者。

trans-unit.source: The default is an empty string ("").
trans-unit.target: 預設為空字串 ("")。

trans-unit.source: To set the recipient of a SOAP header, set the <xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.SoapHeader.Actor%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 若要設定 SOAP 標頭的收件者，設定<xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.SoapHeader.Actor%2A>屬性。

trans-unit.source: Regardless of the version of the SOAP protocol used to communicate with an XML Web service, the .NET Framework automatically generates the SOAP message specific to the version of the SOAP protocol.
trans-unit.target: 不論用來與 XML Web 服務通訊的 SOAP 通訊協定版本，.NET Framework 會自動產生的 SOAP 通訊協定版本特有的 SOAP 訊息。

trans-unit.source: Specifically, the XML element and XML namespace representing the recipient differ for the two versions.
trans-unit.target: 具體而言，XML 項目與 XML 命名空間代表收件者與不同的兩個版本中。

trans-unit.source: XML Web services receiving the SOAP header can get the intended recipient by getting either the <xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.SoapHeader.Role%2A> or <xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.SoapHeader.Actor%2A> properties.
trans-unit.target: XML Web 服務接收的 SOAP 標頭可以藉由取得其中取得預定的收件者<xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.SoapHeader.Role%2A>或<xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.SoapHeader.Actor%2A>屬性。

trans-unit.source: The recipient(s) for the `Body` element and each of the SOAP headers within the `Header` element of a SOAP message need not be the same.
trans-unit.target: 為收件者`Body`項目和每個 SOAP 標頭內`Header`SOAP 訊息的項目不需要相同。

trans-unit.source: If a `Header` element exists in the SOAP message, it represents additional data that can be sent to and from the XML Web service method or an intermediary.
trans-unit.target: 如果`Header`SOAP 訊息中的項目存在，它代表 XML Web service 方法或媒介可以傳送的其他資料。

trans-unit.source: The recipient of that data, known as the SOAP `Actor` in version 1.1, can be a different URI than the URI for the XML Web service method.
trans-unit.target: 收件者的資料，又稱為 SOAP`Actor`在 1.1 版中，可以是不同的 URI，比 XML Web service 方法的 URI。

trans-unit.source: For more information on the SOAP `actor` attribute, see the SOAP specification at http://www.w3.org/TR/SOAP/.
trans-unit.target: 如需有關 SOAP`actor`屬性，請參閱在 SOAP 規格http://www.w3.org/TR/SOAP/。

trans-unit.source: The following XML Web service client calls the `MyWebMethod` XML Web service method after creating a custom SOAP header of type `MyHeader` and setting the <xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.SoapHeader.Actor%2A> property to `http://www.contoso.com/MySoapHeaderHandler`.
trans-unit.target: 下列的 XML Web 服務用戶端呼叫`MyWebMethod`XML Web service 方法，在建立類型的自訂 SOAP 標頭之後`MyHeader`和設定<xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.SoapHeader.Actor%2A>屬性`http://www.contoso.com/MySoapHeaderHandler`。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value indicating whether an XML Web service method properly processed a SOAP header.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定值，指出 XML Web Service 方法是否已適當地處理 SOAP 標頭。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the SOAP header was properly processed; otherwise <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果 SOAP 標頭已適當地處理，則為 <see langword="true" />，否則為 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: For SOAP headers defined by an XML Web service, ASP.NET assumes the XML Web service method properly processed the SOAP header by setting the initial value of <xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.SoapHeader.DidUnderstand%2A> to `true`.
trans-unit.target: XML Web 服務所定義的 SOAP 標頭，ASP.NET 會假設 XML Web 服務方法才能正確處理 SOAP 標頭設定的初始值<xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.SoapHeader.DidUnderstand%2A>至`true`。

trans-unit.source: For SOAP headers not defined by the XML Web service, the initial value is `false`.
trans-unit.target: 初始值會是未定義的 XML Web 服務的 SOAP 標頭， `false`。

trans-unit.source: If ASP.NET detects SOAP headers passed to an XML Web service method with <xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.SoapHeader.DidUnderstand%2A> set to `false` after the method returns, a <xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.SoapHeaderException> is thrown back to the XML Web service client instead of the results from the XML Web service method.
trans-unit.target: 如果 ASP.NET 偵測到的 SOAP 標頭會傳遞至 XML Web 服務方法使用<xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.SoapHeader.DidUnderstand%2A>設`false`方法傳回之後，<xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.SoapHeaderException>擲回給 XML Web 服務用戶端，而結果不是從 XML Web 服務方法。

trans-unit.source: The following `MyWebService` XML Web service defines the `MyHeader` SOAP header and requires it to be sent with any calls to the `MyWebMethod` XML Web service method.
trans-unit.target: 下列`MyWebService`XML Web 服務定義`MyHeader`SOAP 標頭，並需要將它與任何呼叫一起傳送`MyWebMethod`XML Web service 方法。

trans-unit.source: Additionally, the `MyWebMethod` receives any SOAP headers other than the `MyHeader` SOAP header.
trans-unit.target: 此外，`MyWebMethod`接收任何 SOAP 標頭以外`MyHeader`SOAP 標頭。

trans-unit.source: For SOAP headers that `MyWebMethod` can process, <xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.SoapHeader.DidUnderstand%2A> is set to `true`.
trans-unit.target: SOAP 標頭，`MyWebMethod`可以處理<xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.SoapHeader.DidUnderstand%2A>設`true`。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the value of the <see langword="mustUnderstand" /> XML attribute for the SOAP header when communicating with SOAP protocol version 1.1.
trans-unit.target: 與 SOAP 通訊協定 1.1 版通訊時，取得或設定 SOAP 標頭的 <see langword="mustUnderstand" /> XML 屬性值。

trans-unit.source: The value of the <see langword="mustUnderstand" /> attribute.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="mustUnderstand" /> 屬性的值。

trans-unit.source: The default is "0".
trans-unit.target: 預設值是「0」。

trans-unit.source: Do not use this property.
trans-unit.target: 請勿使用這個屬性。

trans-unit.source: Instead use the <xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.SoapHeader.MustUnderstand%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 改用<xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.SoapHeader.MustUnderstand%2A>屬性。

trans-unit.source: The property is set to a value other than: "0", "1", "true", or "false".
trans-unit.target: 屬性值會設為 "0"、"1"、"true" 或 "false" 以外的值。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the value of the <see langword="mustUnderstand" /> XML attribute for the SOAP header when communicating with SOAP protocol version 1.2.
trans-unit.target: 與 SOAP 通訊協定 1.2 版通訊時，取得或設定 SOAP 標頭的 <see langword="mustUnderstand" /> XML 屬性值。

trans-unit.source: The value of the <see langword="mustUnderstand" /> XML attribute of a SOAP header.
trans-unit.target: SOAP 標頭之 <see langword="mustUnderstand" /> XML 屬性的值。

trans-unit.source: The default is "0".
trans-unit.target: 預設值是「0」。

trans-unit.source: Do not use this property.
trans-unit.target: 請勿使用這個屬性。

trans-unit.source: Instead use the <xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.SoapHeader.MustUnderstand%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 改用<xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.SoapHeader.MustUnderstand%2A>屬性。

trans-unit.source: The property is set to a value other than: "0", "1", "true", or "false".
trans-unit.target: 屬性值會設為 "0"、"1"、"true" 或 "false" 以外的值。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the relay attribute of the SOAP 1.2 header.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定 SOAP 1.2 標頭的轉送屬性。

trans-unit.source: Either "0", "false", "1", or "true".
trans-unit.target: "0"、"false"、"1" 或 "true"。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.SoapHeader.EncodedRelay%2A> property applies only to SOAP 1.2 and indicates whether the recipient of the message forwards this header when it forwards the message to the next node downstream.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.SoapHeader.EncodedRelay%2A>屬性僅適用於 SOAP 1.2，表示訊息的收件者將此標頭轉送時它是否轉寄訊息到下游的下一個節點。

trans-unit.source: Because the .NET Framework does not support SOAP intermediaries, this property is serialized and deserialized but ignored.
trans-unit.target: 因為.NET Framework 不支援 SOAP 媒介，這個屬性會序列化和還原序列化，但忽略。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the <see cref="T:System.Web.Services.Protocols.SoapHeader" /> must be understood.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定值，指出是否必須辨認 <see cref="T:System.Web.Services.Protocols.SoapHeader" />。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the XML Web service must properly interpret and process the <see cref="T:System.Web.Services.Protocols.SoapHeader" />; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果 XML Web Service 必須適當地解譯和處理 <see cref="T:System.Web.Services.Protocols.SoapHeader" />，則為 <see langword="true" />，否則，即為 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: The default is <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 預設值為 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: When an XML Web service client adds a SOAP header to an XML Web service method call with the <xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.SoapHeader.MustUnderstand%2A> property set to `true`, the XML Web service method must set the <xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.SoapHeader.DidUnderstand%2A> property to `true`; otherwise, a <xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.SoapHeaderException> is thrown back to the XML Web service client by ASP.NET.
trans-unit.target: 當 XML Web 服務用戶端將 SOAP 標頭加入至具有的 XML Web 服務方法呼叫<xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.SoapHeader.MustUnderstand%2A>屬性設定為`true`，XML Web 服務方法必須設定<xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.SoapHeader.DidUnderstand%2A>屬性`true`，否則<xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.SoapHeaderException>擲回由 ASP.NET XML Web 服務用戶端。

trans-unit.source: Although both the <xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.SoapHeader.EncodedMustUnderstand%2A> and <xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.SoapHeader.MustUnderstand%2A> properties can be used to set the value of the `mustUnderstand` attribute within the SOAP header, the <xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.SoapHeader.MustUnderstand%2A> property allows you to set the attribute using a Boolean value.
trans-unit.target: 雖然同時<xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.SoapHeader.EncodedMustUnderstand%2A>和<xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.SoapHeader.MustUnderstand%2A>屬性可以用來設定的值`mustUnderstand`中 SOAP 標頭屬性<xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.SoapHeader.MustUnderstand%2A>屬性可讓您將使用布林值屬性設定。

trans-unit.source: For details on adding SOAP headers to clients, see [[\<topic://cpconusingsoapheaders>]](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/7bd961f2-b492-48d0-bafe-09d5d5fec3ba).
trans-unit.target: 如需將 SOAP 標頭加入至用戶端的詳細資訊，請參閱[ [ \<topic://cpconusingsoapheaders >]](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/7bd961f2-b492-48d0-bafe-09d5d5fec3ba)。

trans-unit.source: The following XML Web service client defines a custom SOAP header of type `MyHeader`, sets the <xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.SoapHeader.MustUnderstand%2A> property to `true`, and invokes the `MyWebMethod` XML Web service method.
trans-unit.target: 下列 XML Web 服務用戶端定義類型的自訂 SOAP 標頭`MyHeader`，設定<xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.SoapHeader.MustUnderstand%2A>屬性`true`，並叫用`MyWebMethod`XML Web service 方法。

trans-unit.source: If the XML Web service method does not set the <xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.SoapHeader.DidUnderstand%2A> property of the `MyHeader` SOAP header to `true`, a <xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.SoapHeaderException> is thrown.
trans-unit.target: 如果 XML Web 服務方法並不會設定<xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.SoapHeader.DidUnderstand%2A>屬性`MyHeader`SOAP 標頭來`true`、<xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.SoapHeaderException>就會擲回。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether the SOAP header is to be relayed to the next SOAP node if the current node does not understand the header.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定值，指出如果目前節點無法辨認標頭，是否會將 SOAP 標頭轉送至下一個 SOAP 節點。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the SOAP header has a "relay" attribute set to "true"; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果 SOAP 標頭的 "relay" 屬性設為 "true" 則為 <see langword="true" />，否則為 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: The default SOAP 1.2 processing rules require SOAP nodes to remove headers that are not understood by the SOAP processing node before passing the message on to the next node.
trans-unit.target: 預設的 SOAP 1.2 處理規則需要 SOAP 節點移除不了解 SOAP 處理節點，然後將傳遞訊息的下一個節點的標頭。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the recipient of the SOAP header.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定 SOAP 標頭的收件者。

trans-unit.source: A URI that represents the recipient of the SOAP header.
trans-unit.target: URI，表示 SOAP 標頭的收件者。

trans-unit.source: The default is an empty string ("").
trans-unit.target: 預設為空字串 ("")。

trans-unit.source: To set the recipient of a SOAP header, set the <xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.SoapHeader.Actor%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 若要設定 SOAP 標頭的收件者，設定<xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.SoapHeader.Actor%2A>屬性。

trans-unit.source: Regardless of the version of the SOAP protocol used to communicate with an XML Web service, the .NET Framework automatically generates the SOAP message specific to the version of the SOAP protocol.
trans-unit.target: 不論用來與 XML Web 服務通訊的 SOAP 通訊協定版本，.NET Framework 會自動產生的 SOAP 通訊協定版本特有的 SOAP 訊息。

trans-unit.source: Specifically, the XML element and XML namespace representing the recipient differ for the two versions.
trans-unit.target: 具體而言，XML 項目與 XML 命名空間代表收件者與不同的兩個版本中。

trans-unit.source: XML Web services receiving the SOAP header can get the intended recipient by getting either the <xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.SoapHeader.Role%2A> or <xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.SoapHeader.Actor%2A> properties.
trans-unit.target: XML Web 服務接收的 SOAP 標頭可以藉由取得其中取得預定的收件者<xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.SoapHeader.Role%2A>或<xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.SoapHeader.Actor%2A>屬性。

trans-unit.source: The recipient(s) for the `Body` element and each of the SOAP headers within the `Header` element of a SOAP message need not be the same.
trans-unit.target: 為收件者`Body`項目和每個 SOAP 標頭內`Header`SOAP 訊息的項目不需要相同。

trans-unit.source: If a `Header` element exists in the SOAP message, it represents additional data that can be sent to and from the XML Web service method or an intermediary.
trans-unit.target: 如果`Header`SOAP 訊息中的項目存在，它代表 XML Web service 方法或媒介可以傳送的其他資料。

trans-unit.source: The recipient of that data, known as the SOAP `Role` in version 1.2 of the SOAP specification and the SOAP `Actor` in version 1.1, can be a different URI than the URI for the XML Web service method.
trans-unit.target: 收件者的資料，又稱為 SOAP `Role` SOAP 規格和 SOAP 1.2 版中`Actor`在 1.1 版中，可以是不同的 URI，比 XML Web service 方法的 URI。

trans-unit.source: For more information on the SOAP `actor` attribute, see the SOAP specification at http://www.w3.org/TR/SOAP/.
trans-unit.target: 如需有關 SOAP`actor`屬性，請參閱在 SOAP 規格http://www.w3.org/TR/SOAP/。
